General.Name: Shanghai Menon Animal Nutrition Technology Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Shanghai Menon Animal Nutrition Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of feed additives and raw materials in China. It offers food attractants, sweeteners, acidulants, plant extracts, sodium butyrate, glyceryl butyrate, emulsifiers, small peptides, etc. for pig, poultry, ruminate, and aquatic products. The company also exports its products to Asia, Europe, North America, South America, Africa, and other countries and regions in Oceania. Shanghai Menon Animal Nutrition Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is based in Shanghai, China.
